00047 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00048 {
00049     if(argc < 3)
00050     {
00051         printUsage();
00052         exit(1);
00053     }
00054 
00055     bool isToHiragana = true;
00056     if(! strcmp(argv[1], OPTION_TO))
00057     {
00058         if(! strcmp(argv[2], "kata"))
00059             isToHiragana = false;
00060         else if(strcmp(argv[2], "hira"))
00061         {
00062             cerr << "unknown option value: " << argv[2] << endl;
00063             printUsage();
00064             exit(1);
00065         }
00066     }
00067     else
00068     {
00069         cerr << "unknown command option: " << argv[1] << endl;
00070         printUsage();
00071         exit(1);
00072     }
00073 
00074     // set dictionary files
00075     const char* sysdict = TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_SYSTEM_DICT;
00076     if(argc > 3)
00077     {
00078         if(! strcmp(argv[3], OPTION_DICT))
00079         {
00080             if(argc < 5)
00081             {
00082                 cerr << "no option value: " << argv[3] << endl;
00083                 printUsage();
00084                 exit(1);
00085             }
00086             sysdict = argv[4];
00087         }
00088         else
00089         {
00090             cerr << "unknown command option: " << argv[3] << endl;
00091             printUsage();
00092             exit(1);
00093         }
00094     }
00095     cout << "system dictionary: " << sysdict << endl;
00096 
00097     // create factory
00098     JMA_Factory* factory = JMA_Factory::instance();
00099 
00100     // ensure only one instance exists
00101     assert(factory == JMA_Factory::instance());
00102 
00103     // create analyzer and knowledge
00104     Analyzer* analyzer = factory->createAnalyzer();
00105     Knowledge* knowledge = factory->createKnowledge();
00106 
00107     // set encoding type from the dictionary path
00108     string sysdictStr(sysdict);
00109     size_t first = sysdictStr.find_last_of('_');
00110     size_t last = sysdictStr.find_last_not_of('/');
00111     string encodeStr = sysdictStr.substr(first+1, last-first);
00112     Knowledge::EncodeType encode = Knowledge::decodeEncodeType(encodeStr.c_str());
00113     if(encode != Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_NUM)
00114     {
00115         cout << "encoding type: " << encodeStr << endl;
00116         knowledge->setEncodeType(encode);
00117     }
00118 
00119     // load dictioanry files
00120     knowledge->setSystemDict(sysdict);
00121     int result = knowledge->loadDict();
00122     if(result == 0)
00123     {
00124         cerr << "fail to load dictionary files" << endl;
00125         exit(1);
00126     }
00127 
00128     // set knowledge
00129     analyzer->setKnowledge(knowledge);
00130 
00131     string line;
00132     while(getline(cin, line))
00133     {
00134         if(isToHiragana)
00135             cout << "Hiragana:" << endl << analyzer->convertToHiragana(line.c_str()) << endl << endl;
00136         else
00137             cout << "Katakana:" << endl << analyzer->convertToKatakana(line.c_str()) << endl << endl;
00138     }
00139 
00140     delete knowledge;
00141     delete analyzer;
00142 
00143     return 0;
00144 }
